minesweeper.minesweeper difficulty: Lists the details of each difficulty
minesweeper.minesweeper new <difficulty>: Creates a new minesweeper board of <difficulty>.
minesweeper.minesweeper open <x> <y>: Opens the cell (<x>,<y>) on your minesweeper board.
minesweeper.minesweeper flag <x> <y>: Flags the cell (<x>,<y>) on your minesweeper board.
minesweeper.minesweeper unflag <x> <y>: Unflags the cell (<x>,<y>) on your minesweeper board.

userinfo.userinfo hamehistory <player>: Lists the Minecraft name history of <player>

wikipedia.wikipedia search <title>: Searches for articles with <title> on Wikipedia

spam.spam <message> <amount>: Spams <message> <amount> amount of times. (WARNING: spamming is bad)
